TCName.name: VerifyGoodsSalesHAWA
TCName.HAWA: SELECT DISTINCT A.MATNR FROM SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING B, SAAP.ZWOWC_ART_LIST_DEPARTMENT C WHERE A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND B.MATNR = C.MATNR and C.matnr in (select matnr from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING where alc_status<>'DA') AND A.MTART ='HAWA' AND B.PERPETUAL_FLAG ='Y' AND B.SOURCE_OF_SUPPLY <>'A' and A.PBD_ind<>'Y'
TCName.Records: select * from local_wow_soh_LOG where MATNR in ('Random') AND CHANGED_DATE > 'Date' ORDER BY CHANGED_TIMESTAMP DESC
TCName.MatnrDetails: select A.MATNR,B.ARTICLE_DESC,A.MEINH,A.CURRENT_SOH, A.NEW_SOH from local_wow_soh_LOG A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER B where A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND A.MATNR in ('Random') AND A.CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' and A.ADJ_TYPE='SALES' ORDER BY A.CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.DETAILS: select matnr,current_soh,new_soh,case when sign(adj_qty*sign) = -1 then cast(adj_qty*sign as nvarchar(20)) else '+'||(adj_qty*sign) end case as Adjusted from LOCAL_WOW_SOH_LOG where matnr='Random' and changed_date >= 'Date' and adj_type='SALES' order by CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc

TCName.name: VerifyGoodsSalesWeighted
TCName.Weighted: SELECT DISTINCT A.MATNR FROM SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING B, SAAP.ZWOWC_ART_LIST_DEPARTMENT C WHERE A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND B.MATNR = C.MATNR and C.matnr in (select matnr from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING where alc_status<>'DA') and A.Weighted_ind ='Y' and A.Random_weight_flg<>'Y' AND B.PERPETUAL_FLAG ='Y' AND B.SOURCE_OF_SUPPLY <>'A' and A.PBD_ind<>'Y'
TCName.MatnrDetails: select A.MATNR,B.ARTICLE_DESC,A.MEINH,A.CURRENT_SOH, A.NEW_SOH from local_wow_soh_LOG A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER B where A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND A.MATNR in ('Random') AND A.CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' and A.ADJ_TYPE='SALES' ORDER BY A.CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.DETAILS: select matnr,current_soh,new_soh,case when sign(adj_qty*sign) = -1 then cast(adj_qty*sign as nvarchar(20)) else '+'||(adj_qty*sign) end case as Adjusted from LOCAL_WOW_SOH_LOG where matnr='Random' and changed_date >= 'Date' and adj_type='SALES' order by CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc

TCName.name: VerifyGoodsRWT
TCName.RandomWeighted: SELECT DISTINCT B.MATNR FROM SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING B, SAAP.ZWOWC_ART_LIST_DEPARTMENT C WHERE A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND B.MATNR = C.MATNR and C.matnr in (select matnr from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING where alc_status<>'DA') and B.Random_weight_flg='Y' and A.Weighted_ind<>'Y,N' AND B.PERPETUAL_FLAG ='Y' AND B.SOURCE_OF_SUPPLY <>'A' and A.PBD_ind<>'Y'
TCName.DETAILS: select A.MATNR,B.ARTICLE_DESC,A.MEINH,A.CURRENT_SOH,A.CURRENT_SOH_PI, A.NEW_SOH,A.NEW_SOH_PI from local_wow_soh_LOG A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER B where A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND A.MATNR in ('Random') AND A.CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' and A.ADJ_TYPE='SALES' ORDER BY A.CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc

TCName.name: VerifyGoodsPBD
TCName.PBD: SELECT DISTINCT A.MATNR FROM SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING B, SAAP.ZWOWC_ART_LIST_DEPARTMENT C WHERE A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND B.MATNR = C.MATNR and C.matnr in (select matnr from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING where alc_status<>'DA') and A.PBD_ind='Y' AND B.PERPETUAL_FLAG ='Y' AND B.SOURCE_OF_SUPPLY <>'A' AND A.MATNR NOT IN (SELECT PLU_CODE FROM SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER)
TCName.DETAILS: select A.MATNR,B.ARTICLE_DESC,A.MEINH,A.CURRENT_SOH, A.NEW_SOH from local_wow_soh_LOG A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER B where A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND A.MATNR in ('Random') AND A.CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' and A.ADJ_TYPE='SALES' ORDER BY A.CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc

TCName.name: VerifyGoodsSales
TCName.DETAILS: select A.MATNR,B.ARTICLE_DESC,A.MEINH,A.CURRENT_SOH, A.NEW_SOH,A.ADJ_QTY from local_wow_soh_LOG A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER B where A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND A.MATNR in ('337153') AND A.CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' ORDER BY A.CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.CHILDDETAILS: select A.MATNR,B.ARTICLE_DESC,A.MEINH,A.CURRENT_SOH, A.NEW_SOH from local_wow_soh_LOG A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER B where A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND A.MATNR in ('Child') AND A.CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' ORDER BY A.CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.CHILD: select CHILD_ARTICLE,child_article_qty from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_CHILD where matnr='PARENT'
TCName.CHILDQTY: select child_article_qty from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_CHILD where matnr='PARENT'
TCName.ChildAdjustedValue: select adj_type,adj_qty,changed_timestamp from LOCAL_WOW_SOH_LOG where matnr = 'Child' AND CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_type='SALES' ORDER BY CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.Numerator: select numerator,denominator from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM where matnr='PARENT'

TCName.name: VerifyGoodsDisplay
TCName.DETAILS: select A.MATNR,B.ARTICLE_DESC,A.MEINH,A.CURRENT_SOH, A.NEW_SOH,A.ADJ_QTY from local_wow_soh_LOG A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER B where A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND A.MATNR in ('406570') AND A.CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' ORDER BY A.CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.CHILDDETAILS: select A.MATNR,B.ARTICLE_DESC,A.MEINH,A.CURRENT_SOH, A.NEW_SOH from local_wow_soh_LOG A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER B where A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND A.MATNR in ('Child') AND A.CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' ORDER BY A.CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.CHILD: select CHILD_ARTICLE,child_article_qty from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_CHILD where matnr='PARENT'
TCName.CHILDQTY: select child_article_qty from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_CHILD where matnr='PARENT'
TCName.ChildAdjustedValue: select adj_type,adj_qty,changed_timestamp from LOCAL_WOW_SOH_LOG where matnr = 'Child' AND CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_type='SALES' ORDER BY CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.Numerator: select numerator,denominator from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM where matnr='PARENT'

TCName.name: VerifyGoodsHAWAAdjustment
TCName.HAWA: SELECT DISTINCT A.MATNR FROM SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING B, SAAP.ZWOWC_ART_LIST_DEPARTMENT C WHERE A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND B.MATNR = C.MATNR and C.matnr in (select matnr from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING where alc_status<>'DA') AND A.MTART ='HAWA' AND B.PERPETUAL_FLAG ='Y' AND B.SOURCE_OF_SUPPLY <>'A'
TCName.DETAILS: select A.MATNR,B.ARTICLE_DESC,A.MEINH from local_wow_soh_LOG A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER B where A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND A.MATNR in ('Random') AND A.CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' ORDER BY A.CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.Compare: select matnr,current_soh,new_soh,case when sign(adj_qty*sign) = -1 then cast(adj_qty*sign as nvarchar(20)) else '+'||(adj_qty*sign) end case as Adjusted from LOCAL_WOW_SOH_LOG where matnr='Random' and changed_date >= 'FILTERDATE' order by CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc

TCName.name: VerifyGoodsRWTAdjustment
TCName.RWT: SELECT DISTINCT A.MATNR FROM SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING B, SAAP.ZWOWC_ART_LIST_DEPARTMENT C WHERE A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND B.MATNR = C.MATNR and C.matnr in (select matnr from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING where alc_status<>'DA') AND B.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG ='Y' AND B.PERPETUAL_FLAG ='Y' AND B.SOURCE_OF_SUPPLY <>'A'
TCName.DETAILS: select A.MATNR,B.ARTICLE_DESC,A.MEINH from local_wow_soh_LOG A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER B where A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND A.MATNR in ('Random') AND A.CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_type='SDJ' and adj_user <>'System' ORDER BY A.CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.Compare: select matnr,current_soh,new_soh,case when sign(adj_qty*sign) = -1 then cast(adj_qty*sign as nvarchar(20)) else '+'||(adj_qty*sign) end case as Adjusted, current_soh_pi,new_soh_pi,case when sign(adj_qty_pi*sign) = -1 then cast(adj_qty_pi*sign as nvarchar(20)) else '+'||(adj_qty_pi*sign) end case as Adjusted_pi from LOCAL_WOW_SOH_LOG where matnr='Random' and changed_date >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_type='SDJ' and adj_user <>'System' order by CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc

TCName.name: VerifyGoodsSalesSetAdjustmentforKG
TCName.BakerySalesSet: select A.matnr,count(A.child_article),B.MTART, D.MEINS from zwowc_article_child A JOIN zwowc_article_master B ON A.matnr=B.matnr AND B.sales_set_flag='Y' AND B.MTART='ZPRD' JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING C ON B.MATNR=C.MATNR JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM D ON C.MATNR = D.MATNR and D.matnr in (select matnr from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING where alc_status<>'DA') AND D.MEINS ='KG' group by A.matnr, B.MTART, D.MEINS
TCName.DETAILS: select A.MATNR,B.ARTICLE_DESC,A.MEINH,A.CURRENT_SOH, A.NEW_SOH,A.ADJ_QTY from local_wow_soh_LOG A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER B where A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND A.MATNR in ('Random') AND A.CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' ORDER BY A.CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.Compare: select matnr,current_soh,new_soh,case when sign(adj_qty*sign) = -1 then cast(adj_qty*sign as nvarchar(20)) else '+'||(adj_qty*sign) end case as Adjusted from LOCAL_WOW_SOH_LOG where matnr='Random' and changed_date >= 'FILTERDATE' order by CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.CHILD: select CHILD_ARTICLE,child_article_qty from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_CHILD where matnr='Random'
TCName.CHILDDETAILS: select A.MATNR,B.ARTICLE_DESC,A.MEINH,A.CURRENT_SOH, A.NEW_SOH,A.ADJ_QTY from local_wow_soh_LOG A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER B where A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND A.MATNR in ('Child') AND A.CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' and A.ADJ_QTY>0 ORDER BY A.CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.Numerator: select numerator,denominator from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM where matnr='Random'
TCName.CHILDQTY: select child_article_qty from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_CHILD where child_article='Child' and matnr='Random'
TCName.ChildAdjustedValue: select adj_type,adj_qty,changed_timestamp from LOCAL_WOW_SOH_LOG where matnr = 'Child' AND CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_qty>0 ORDER BY CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc

TCName.name: VerifyGoodsSalesSetAdjustmentforEA
TCName.BakerySalesSet: select A.matnr,count(A.child_article),B.MTART, D.MEINS from zwowc_article_child A JOIN zwowc_article_master B ON A.matnr=B.matnr AND B.sales_set_flag='Y' AND B.MTART='ZPRD' JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING C ON B.MATNR=C.MATNR JOIN ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM D ON C.MATNR = D.MATNR and D.matnr in (select matnr from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING where alc_status<>'DA') AND D.MEINS ='EA' group by A.matnr, B.MTART, D.MEINS
TCName.DETAILS: select A.MATNR,B.ARTICLE_DESC,A.MEINH,A.CURRENT_SOH, A.NEW_SOH,A.ADJ_QTY from local_wow_soh_LOG A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER B where A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND A.MATNR in ('Random') AND A.CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' ORDER BY A.CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.Compare: select matnr,current_soh,new_soh,case when sign(adj_qty*sign) = -1 then cast(adj_qty*sign as nvarchar(20)) else '+'||(adj_qty*sign) end case as Adjusted from LOCAL_WOW_SOH_LOG where matnr='Random' and changed_date >= 'FILTERDATE' order by CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.CHILD: select CHILD_ARTICLE,child_article_qty from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_CHILD where matnr='Random'
TCName.CHILDDETAILS: select A.MATNR,B.ARTICLE_DESC,A.MEINH,A.CURRENT_SOH, A.NEW_SOH,A.ADJ_QTY from local_wow_soh_LOG A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER B where A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND A.MATNR in ('Child') AND A.CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' and A.ADJ_QTY>0 ORDER BY A.CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.Numerator: select numerator,denominator from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM where matnr='Random'
TCName.CHILDQTY: select child_article_qty from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_CHILD where child_article='Child' and matnr='Random'
TCName.ChildAdjustedValue: select adj_type,adj_qty,changed_timestamp from LOCAL_WOW_SOH_LOG where matnr = 'Child' AND CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_qty>0 ORDER BY CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc

TCName.name: VerifyGoodsDisplaySetAdjustment
TCName.DisplaySalesSet: select matnr from SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING where matnr in (SELECT matnr FROM SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER where DISPLAY_ITEM_IND = 'Y' and matnr in (select matnr from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING where alc_status<>'DA') )
TCName.DETAILS: select A.MATNR,B.ARTICLE_DESC,A.MEINH,A.CURRENT_SOH, A.NEW_SOH,A.ADJ_QTY from local_wow_soh_LOG A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER B where A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND A.MATNR in ('Random') AND A.CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' ORDER BY A.CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.Compare: select matnr,current_soh,new_soh,case when sign(adj_qty*sign) = -1 then cast(adj_qty*sign as nvarchar(20)) else '+'||(adj_qty*sign) end case as Adjusted from LOCAL_WOW_SOH_LOG where matnr='Random' and changed_date >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_type='SDJ' and adj_user <>'System' order by CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.CHILD: select CHILD_ARTICLE,child_article_qty from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_CHILD where matnr='Random'
TCName.CHILDDETAILS: select A.MATNR,B.ARTICLE_DESC,A.MEINH,A.CURRENT_SOH, A.NEW_SOH,A.ADJ_QTY from local_wow_soh_LOG A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER B where A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND A.MATNR in ('Child') AND A.CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' and A.ADJ_QTY>0 ORDER BY A.CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.CHILDQTY: select child_article_qty from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_CHILD where child_article='Child' and matnr='Random'
TCName.ChildAdjustedValue: select adj_type,adj_qty,changed_timestamp from LOCAL_WOW_SOH_LOG where matnr = 'Child' AND CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_qty>0 ORDER BY CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc

TCName.name: VerifyGoodsDisplayExceptionAdjustment
TCName.DisplayException: SELECT DISTINCT A.MATNR FROM SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING B, SAAP.ZWOWC_ART_LIST_DEPARTMENT C WHERE A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND B.MATNR = C.MATNR and C.matnr in (select matnr from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING where alc_status<>'DA') AND A.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND ='Y' AND B.PERPETUAL_FLAG ='Y' AND B.COMPLEX_PACK_BRK_ARTICLE ='' AND A.MATNR NOT IN (SELECT PLU_CODE FROM SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER)
TCName.DETAILS: select A.MATNR,B.ARTICLE_DESC,A.MEINH from local_wow_soh_LOG A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER B where A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND A.MATNR in ('Random') AND A.CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_type='SDJ' and adj_user <>'System' ORDER BY A.CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.Compare: select matnr,current_soh,new_soh,case when sign(adj_qty*sign) = -1 then cast(adj_qty*sign as nvarchar(20)) else '+'||(adj_qty*sign) end case as Adjusted from LOCAL_WOW_SOH_LOG where matnr='Random' and changed_date >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_type='SDJ' and adj_user <>'System' order by CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc

TCName.name: VerifyGoodsIBTHAWA
TCName.HAWA: select distinct a.matnr from saap.zwowc_article_master a,saap.zwowc_article_uom b,saap.zwowc_article_ean c,saap.zwowc_article_listing d,saap.zwowc_ARTICLE_HIER_XREF e where a.matnr=b.matnr and b.matnr=c.matnr and c.matnr=d.matnr and d.matnr=e.matnr and d.alc_status<>'DA' and a.TEMPERATURE_IND='03' AND A.MTART ='HAWA' AND d.PERPETUAL_FLAG ='Y' and d.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG='N' AND d.SOURCE_OF_SUPPLY <>'A' and a.matnr not like '6%'
TCName.DETAILS: select A.MATNR,B.ARTICLE_DESC,A.MEINH,(A.adj_type+A.ref_no) as Reasoncode, substr(reasoncode ,1, 3)||' '||'order '||substr(reasoncode,6) AS Reasoncode_Modified,A.CURRENT_SOH, A.NEW_SOH,(A.ADJ_QTY*A.Sign) as AdjustedValue from local_wow_soh_LOG A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER B where A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND A.MATNR in ('Random') AND A.CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_type='IBTCR' and adj_user <>'System' ORDER BY A.CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.Compare: select matnr,current_soh,new_soh,case when sign(adj_qty*sign) = -1 then cast(adj_qty*sign as nvarchar(20)) else '+'||(adj_qty*sign) end case as Adjusted from LOCAL_WOW_SOH_LOG where matnr='Random' and changed_date >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_type='IBTCR' and adj_user <>'System' order by CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc

TCName.name: VerifyGoodsIBTPBD
TCName.PBD: select distinct a.matnr from saap.zwowc_article_master a,saap.zwowc_article_uom b,saap.zwowc_article_ean c,saap.zwowc_article_listing d,saap.zwowc_ARTICLE_HIER_XREF e where a.matnr=b.matnr and b.matnr=c.matnr and c.matnr=d.matnr and d.matnr=e.matnr and d.alc_status<>'DA' and a.TEMPERATURE_IND='03' AND A.MTART ='HAWA' AND d.PERPETUAL_FLAG ='Y' AND d.SOURCE_OF_SUPPLY <>'A' and a.PBD_IND='Y' and a.matnr not like '6%'
TCName.DETAILS: select A.MATNR,B.ARTICLE_DESC,A.MEINH,(A.adj_type+A.ref_no) as Reasoncode, substr(reasoncode ,1, 3)||' '||'order '||substr(reasoncode,6) AS Reasoncode_Modified,A.CURRENT_SOH, A.NEW_SOH,(A.ADJ_QTY*A.Sign) as AdjustedValue from local_wow_soh_LOG A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER B where A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND A.MATNR in ('Random') AND A.CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_type='IBTCR' and adj_user <>'System' ORDER BY A.CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.Compare: select matnr,current_soh,new_soh,case when sign(adj_qty*sign) = -1 then cast(adj_qty*sign as nvarchar(20)) else '+'||(adj_qty*sign) end case as Adjusted from LOCAL_WOW_SOH_LOG where matnr='Random' and changed_date >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_type='IBTCR' and adj_user <>'System' order by CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc

TCName.name: VerifyGoodsIBTWeighted
TCName.WEIGHTED: SELECT DISTINCT A.MATNR FROM SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING B, SAAP.ZWOWC_ART_LIST_DEPARTMENT C WHERE A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND B.MATNR = C.MATNR and C.matnr in (select matnr from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING where alc_status<>'DA') AND A.WEIGHTED_IND ='Y' AND B.PERPETUAL_FLAG ='Y' AND B.SOURCE_OF_SUPPLY <>'A' and a.matnr not like '6%'
TCName.DETAILS: select A.MATNR,B.ARTICLE_DESC,A.MEINH,(A.adj_type+A.ref_no) as Reasoncode, substr(reasoncode ,1, 3)||' '||'order '||substr(reasoncode,6) AS Reasoncode_Modified,A.CURRENT_SOH, A.NEW_SOH,(A.ADJ_QTY*A.sign) as Adjusted from local_wow_soh_LOG A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER B where A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND A.MATNR in ('Random') AND A.CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_type='IBTCR' and adj_user <>'System' ORDER BY A.CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.Compare: select matnr,current_soh,new_soh,case when sign(adj_qty*sign) = -1 then cast(adj_qty*sign as nvarchar(20)) else '+'||(adj_qty*sign) end case as Adjusted from LOCAL_WOW_SOH_LOG where matnr='Random' and changed_date >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_type='IBTCR' and adj_user <>'System' order by CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc

TCName.name: VerifyGoodsIBTDisplayException
TCName.DisplayException: SELECT DISTINCT A.MATNR FROM SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING B, SAAP.ZWOWC_ART_LIST_DEPARTMENT C WHERE A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND B.MATNR = C.MATNR and C.matnr in (select matnr from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING where alc_status<>'DA') AND A.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND ='Y' AND B.PERPETUAL_FLAG ='Y' AND B.COMPLEX_PACK_BRK_ARTICLE ='' AND A.MATNR NOT IN (SELECT PLU_CODE FROM SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER) and a.matnr not like '6%'
TCName.DETAILS: select A.MATNR,B.ARTICLE_DESC,A.MEINH,(A.adj_type+A.ref_no) as Reasoncode, substr(reasoncode ,1, 3)||' '||'order '||substr(reasoncode,6) AS Reasoncode_Modified,A.CURRENT_SOH, A.NEW_SOH,(A.ADJ_QTY*A.sign) as Adjusted from local_wow_soh_LOG A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER B where A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND A.MATNR in ('Random') AND A.CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_type='IBTCR' and adj_user <>'System' ORDER BY A.CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.Compare: select matnr,current_soh,new_soh,case when sign(adj_qty*sign) = -1 then cast(adj_qty*sign as nvarchar(20)) else '+'||(adj_qty*sign) end case as Adjusted from LOCAL_WOW_SOH_LOG where matnr='Random' and changed_date >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_type='IBTCR' and adj_user <>'System' order by CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc

TCName.name: VerifyGoodsIBTRandomWeighted
TCName.RWT: SELECT A.MATNR FROM ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING A, ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER B WHERE A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND A.PERPETUAL_FLAG = 'Y' AND B.TEMPERATURE_IND ='03' AND A.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG = 'Y' and a.matnr not like '6%'
TCName.DETAILS: select A.MATNR,B.ARTICLE_DESC,A.MEINH,(A.adj_type+A.ref_no) as Reasoncode, substr(reasoncode ,1, 3)||' '||'order '||substr(reasoncode,6) AS Reasoncode_Modified from local_wow_soh_LOG A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER B where A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND A.MATNR in ('RANDOM') AND A.CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_type='IBTCR' and adj_user <>'System' ORDER BY A.CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.Compare: select matnr,current_soh,new_soh,case when sign(adj_qty*sign) = -1 then cast(adj_qty*sign as nvarchar(20)) else '+'||(adj_qty*sign) end case as Adjusted, current_soh_pi,new_soh_pi,case when sign(adj_qty_pi*sign) = -1 then cast(adj_qty_pi*sign as nvarchar(20)) else '+'||(adj_qty_pi*sign) end case as Adjusted_pi from LOCAL_WOW_SOH_LOG where matnr='RANDOM' and changed_date >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_type='IBTCR' and adj_user <>'System' order by CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc

TCName.name: VerifyGoodsIBTCPBD
TCName.CPBD: SELECT DISTINCT A.MATNR, B.ARTICLE_OM,B.COMPLEX_PACK_BRK_ARTICLE,E.STORE_SOH, A.MTART, C.DEPT_NAME, C.CAT_NAME, C.SUB_CAT_NAME, C.SEG_NAME, A.PBD_IND, A.DISPLAY_ITEM_IND, B.RANDOM_WEIGHT_FLG, A.WEIGHTED_IND FROM SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING B, SAAP.ZWOWC_ART_LIST_DEPARTMENT C, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM D, saap.LOCAL_WOW_SOH E WHERE A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND B.MATNR = C.MATNR AND C.MATNR = D.MATNR AND A.MATNR=E.ARTICLE AND E.STORE_SOH >0 AND B.COMPLEX_PACK_BRK_ARTICLE <>'' AND B.ARTICLE_OM>20 and a.matnr not like '6%' and a.matnr not like '4%' and a.matnr not like '2%' and a.matnr not like '9%' ORDER BY B.COMPLEX_PACK_BRK_ARTICLE ASC
TCName.DETAILS: select A.MATNR,B.ARTICLE_DESC,A.MEINH,(A.adj_type+A.ref_no) as Reasoncode, substr(reasoncode ,1, 3)||' '||'order '||substr(reasoncode,6) AS Reasoncode_Modified,A.CURRENT_SOH, A.NEW_SOH,(A.ADJ_QTY*A.Sign) as AdjustedValue from local_wow_soh_LOG A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER B where A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND A.MATNR in ('Random') AND A.CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_type='IBTCR' and adj_user <>'System' ORDER BY A.CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.Compare: select matnr,current_soh,new_soh,case when sign(adj_qty*sign) = -1 then cast(adj_qty*sign as nvarchar(20)) else '+'||(adj_qty*sign) end case as Adjusted from LOCAL_WOW_SOH_LOG where matnr='Random' and changed_date >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_type='IBTCR' and adj_user <>'System' order by CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc

TCName.name: VerifyGoodsRTVHAWA
TCName.HAWA: select distinct a.matnr from saap.zwowc_article_master a,saap.zwowc_article_uom b,saap.zwowc_article_ean c,saap.zwowc_article_listing d,saap.zwowc_ARTICLE_HIER_XREF e where a.matnr=b.matnr and b.matnr=c.matnr and c.matnr=d.matnr and d.matnr=e.matnr and a.mtart='HAWA' and a.PBD_IND<>'Y' and d.alc_status<>'DA' and d.perpetual_flag='Y' and d.lifnr in (select lifnr from ZWOWC_VENDOR_master where land1_name ='Australia')
TCName.DETAILS: select A.MATNR,B.ARTICLE_DESC,A.MEINH,(A.adj_type+A.ref_no) as Reasoncode, substr(reasoncode ,1, 3)||'/Claim '||substr(reasoncode,4) AS Reasoncode_Modified,A.CURRENT_SOH, A.NEW_SOH,(A.ADJ_QTY*A.Sign) as AdjustedValue from local_wow_soh_LOG A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER B where A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND A.MATNR in ('Random') AND A.CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_type='RTV' and adj_user <>'System' ORDER BY A.CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.Compare: select matnr,current_soh,new_soh,case when sign(adj_qty*sign) = -1 then cast(adj_qty*sign as nvarchar(20)) else '+'||(adj_qty*sign) end case as Adjusted from LOCAL_WOW_SOH_LOG where matnr='Random' and changed_date >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_type='RTV' and adj_user <>'System' order by CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc

TCName.name: VerifyGoodsRTVPBD
TCName.PBD: select distinct a.matnr from saap.zwowc_article_master a,saap.zwowc_article_uom b,saap.zwowc_article_ean c,saap.zwowc_article_listing d,saap.zwowc_ARTICLE_HIER_XREF e where a.matnr=b.matnr and b.matnr=c.matnr and c.matnr=d.matnr and d.matnr=e.matnr and d.alc_status<>'DA' and a.TEMPERATURE_IND='03' AND A.MTART ='HAWA' AND d.PERPETUAL_FLAG ='Y' AND d.SOURCE_OF_SUPPLY <>'A' and a.PBD_IND='Y'
TCName.DETAILS: select A.MATNR,B.ARTICLE_DESC,A.MEINH,(A.adj_type+A.ref_no) as Reasoncode, substr(reasoncode ,1, 3)||'/Claim '||substr(reasoncode,4) AS Reasoncode_Modified,A.CURRENT_SOH, A.NEW_SOH,(A.ADJ_QTY*A.Sign) as AdjustedValue from local_wow_soh_LOG A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER B where A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND A.MATNR in ('Random') AND A.CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_type='RTV' and adj_user <>'System' ORDER BY A.CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.Compare: select matnr,current_soh,new_soh,case when sign(adj_qty*sign) = -1 then cast(adj_qty*sign as nvarchar(20)) else '+'||(adj_qty*sign) end case as Adjusted from LOCAL_WOW_SOH_LOG where matnr='Random' and changed_date >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_type='RTV' and adj_user <>'System' order by CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc

TCName.name: VerifyGoodsRTVPBDHigherUOM
TCName.PBD: SELECT DISTINCT A.MATNR FROM SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING B, SAAP.ZWOWC_ART_LIST_DEPARTMENT C WHERE A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND B.MATNR = C.MATNR and C.matnr in (select matnr from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING where alc_status<>'DA') and A.PBD_ind='Y' AND B.PERPETUAL_FLAG ='Y' AND B.SOURCE_OF_SUPPLY <>'A' AND A.MATNR NOT IN (SELECT PLU_CODE FROM SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER) and b.lifnr in (select lifnr from ZWOWC_VENDOR_master where land1_name ='Australia')
TCName.DETAILS: select A.MATNR,B.ARTICLE_DESC,A.MEINH,(A.adj_type+A.ref_no) as Reasoncode, substr(reasoncode ,1, 3)||'/Claim '||substr(reasoncode,4) AS Reasoncode_Modified,A.CURRENT_SOH, A.NEW_SOH,(A.ADJ_QTY*A.Sign) as AdjustedValue from local_wow_soh_LOG A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER B where A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND A.MATNR in ('Random') AND A.CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_type='RTV' and adj_user <>'System' ORDER BY A.CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.Compare: select matnr,current_soh,new_soh,case when sign(adj_qty*sign) = -1 then cast(adj_qty*sign as nvarchar(20)) else '+'||(adj_qty*sign) end case as Adjusted from LOCAL_WOW_SOH_LOG where matnr='Random' and changed_date >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_type='RTV' and adj_user <>'System' order by CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.ArticleOM: select article_om from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING where matnr='Random'

TCName.name: VerifyGoodsRTVLitreArticles
TCName.Litre: select distinct a.matnr from saap.zwowc_article_master a,saap.zwowc_article_uom b,saap.zwowc_article_ean c,saap.zwowc_article_listing d,saap.zwowc_ARTICLE_HIER_XREF e where a.matnr=b.matnr and b.matnr=c.matnr and c.matnr=d.matnr and d.matnr=e.matnr and b.meinh='L' and a.PBD_IND<>'Y' and d.alc_status<>'DA' and d.perpetual_flag='Y' and d.lifnr in (select lifnr from ZWOWC_VENDOR_master where land1_name ='Australia')
TCName.DETAILS: select A.MATNR,B.ARTICLE_DESC,A.MEINH,(A.adj_type+A.ref_no) as Reasoncode, substr(reasoncode ,1, 3)||'/Claim '||substr(reasoncode,4) AS Reasoncode_Modified,A.CURRENT_SOH, A.NEW_SOH,(A.ADJ_QTY*A.Sign) as AdjustedValue from local_wow_soh_LOG A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER B where A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND A.MATNR in ('Random') AND A.CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_type='RTV' and adj_user <>'System' ORDER BY A.CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.Compare: select matnr,current_soh,new_soh,case when sign(adj_qty*sign) = -1 then cast(adj_qty*sign as nvarchar(20)) else '+'||(adj_qty*sign) end case as Adjusted from LOCAL_WOW_SOH_LOG where matnr='Random' and changed_date >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_type='RTV' and adj_user <>'System' order by CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc

TCName.name: VerifyGoodsRTVLitreArticlesForOrderableUOM
TCName.OrderableUOMLitre: select distinct a.matnr from saap.zwowc_article_master a,saap.zwowc_article_uom b,saap.zwowc_article_ean c,saap.zwowc_article_listing d,saap.zwowc_ARTICLE_HIER_XREF e where a.matnr=b.matnr and b.matnr=c.matnr and c.matnr=d.matnr and d.matnr=e.matnr and b.meinh='L' and d.article_om >1 and a.PBD_IND<>'Y' and d.alc_status<>'DA' and d.perpetual_flag='Y' and d.lifnr in (select lifnr from ZWOWC_VENDOR_master where land1_name ='Australia')
TCName.DETAILS: select A.MATNR,B.ARTICLE_DESC,A.MEINH,(A.adj_type+A.ref_no) as Reasoncode, substr(reasoncode ,1, 3)||'/Claim '||substr(reasoncode,4) AS Reasoncode_Modified,A.CURRENT_SOH, A.NEW_SOH,(A.ADJ_QTY*A.Sign) as AdjustedValue from local_wow_soh_LOG A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER B where A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND A.MATNR in ('Random') AND A.CHANGED_DATE >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_type='RTV' and adj_user <>'System' ORDER BY A.CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.Compare: select matnr,current_soh,new_soh,case when sign(adj_qty*sign) = -1 then cast(adj_qty*sign as nvarchar(20)) else '+'||(adj_qty*sign) end case as Adjusted from LOCAL_WOW_SOH_LOG where matnr='Random' and changed_date >= 'FILTERDATE' and adj_type='RTV' and adj_user <>'System' order by CHANGED_TIMESTAMP desc
TCName.ArticleOM: select article_om from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING where matnr='Random'
